verses.verse: A Psalm of praise; of David. I will extol<WH7311> thee<WH430>, my God, O King<WH4428>; And I will bless<WH1288> thy name<WH8034> for ever<WH5703> and ever<WH5703>.
Every day<WH3117> will I bless<WH1288> thee<WH1984>; And I will praise thy name<WH8034> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
Great <WH1419> is Jehovah<WH3068>, and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984>; And his greatness<WH1420> is unsearchable<WH2714>.
One <WH1755> generation<WH1755> shall laud<WH7623> thy works<WH4639> to another<WH5046>, And shall declare thy mighty acts<WH1369>.
Of the glorious<WH3519> majesty<WH3519> of thine honor<WH1926>, And of thy wondrous<WH6381> works<WH1697>, will I meditate<WH7878>.
And men shall speak<WH559> of the might<WH5807> of thy terrible acts<WH3372>; And I will declare<WH5608> thy greatness<WH1420>.
They shall utter<WH5042> the memory<WH2143> of thy great<WH7227> goodness<WH2898>, And shall sing<WH7442> of thy righteousness<WH6666>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is gracious<WH2587>, and merciful<WH7349>; Slow<WH750> to anger<WH639>, and of great<WH1419> lovingkindness<WH2617>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is good<WH2896> to all<WH7356>; And his tender mercies are over all his works<WH4639>.
All thy works<WH4639> shall give thanks<WH3034> unto thee<WH3068>, O Jehovah; And thy saints<WH2623> shall bless thee<WH1288>.
They shall speak<WH559> of the glory<WH3519> of thy kingdom<WH4438>, And talk<WH1696> of thy power<WH1369>;
To make known<WH3045> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> his mighty acts<WH1369>, And the glory<WH3519> of the majesty<WH3519> of his kingdom<WH4438>.
Thy kingdom<WH4438> is an everlasting<WH5769> kingdom<WH4438>, And thy dominion<WH4475> endureth throughout all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
Jehovah <WH3068> upholdeth<WH5564> all that fall<WH5307>, And raiseth up<WH2210> all those that are bowed down<WH3721>.
The eyes<WH5869> of all wait<WH7663> for thee<WH5414>; And thou givest them their food<WH400> in due season<WH6256>.
Thou openest<WH6605> thy hand<WH3027>, And satisfiest<WH7646> the desire<WH7522> of every living thing<WH2416>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is righteous<WH6662> in all his ways<WH1870>, And gracious<WH2623> in all his works<WH4639>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is nigh<WH7138> unto all them that call<WH7121> upon him<WH7121>, To all that call upon him in truth<WH571>.
He will fulfil<WH6213> the desire<WH7522> of them that fear<WH3373> him<WH8085>; He also will hear their cry<WH7775> and will save them<WH3467>.
Jehovah <WH3068> preserveth<WH8104> all them that love<WH157> him<WH7563>; But all the wicked will he destroy<WH8045>.
My mouth<WH6310> shall speak<WH1696> the praise<WH8416> of Jehovah<WH3068>; And let all flesh<WH1320> bless<WH1288> his holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5769>.
